title: The least frequent daily users of social media
summary: This chart shows the Minutes of at the from Age 15-24 to 55-64 .
\\n From the chart we see that the Minutes of were 150 , at their highest in 45-54 .
\\n The Minutes slowly declined over the next 3 - 4 Age to 74 in 35-44 .
gold: This graph compares the least frequent users of social media in minutes and their respected age group . The least frequent users are in the age groups 25 - 34 and 35 - 44 , with both of their minutes being around 75 minutes . This value is almost half of the social media minutes in the 45 - 54 age group ( 150 minutes ) .
